data.comment: Internacional kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Internacional's Edenilson gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Vasco da Gama defender.
In the minute 1, Internacional have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasco da Gama's Martin Benitez gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 3, Throw-in Internacional.
Thiago Galhardo for Internacional is whistled offside.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 5, Internacional push forward at Estadio Beira-Rio and Abel Hernandez gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Vasco da Gama defence.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in the half of Internacional.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
In the minute 9, Can Internacional get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
Corner awarded to Internacional.
In the minute 13, In Porto Alegre, Thiago Galhardo (Internacional) gets his head to the ball but the strike is cleared by an untiring defence.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Internacional.
In the minute 15, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Free kick for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 17, Corner awarded to Internacional.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 18, Internacional's Edenilson looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The match at Estadio Beira-Rio has been interrupted briefly for a check on Edenilson, who is down injured.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Thiago Galhardo's header is off-target for Internacional.
In the minute 24, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Goal! Internacional have got their heads in front thanks to a Edenilson strike.
Great play from Thiago Galhardo to set up the goal.
In the minute 28, Free kick Vasco da Gama.
Carlinhos is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Porto Alegre, Abel Hernandez (Internacional) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 32, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Abel Hernandez for Internacional drives towards goal at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
An attacking Internacional player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Braulio da Silva Machado waits before resuming play because Leandro Castan for Vasco da Gama is still down.
In the minute 37, Carlinhos has recovered and rejoins the match in Porto Alegre.
Internacional have extended their lead to 2-0 courtesy of a Thiago Galhardo penalty.
Vasco da Gama are coming forward and German Cano gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a throw-in for Internacional, close to Vasco da Gama's area.
Internacional's Marcos Guilherme gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 41, It's a goal kick for the away team in Porto Alegre.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 43, Leandro Castan is back on the pitch.
Victor Cuesta is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Internacional to take a throw-in in Vasco da Gama territory.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Victor Cuesta is back on his feet again.
Ball safe as Internacional is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 45, 4 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Porto Alegre.
In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Internacional's Patrick is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 45, Free kick Internacional.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Attention is being given to Internacional’s Patrick and play has been suspended briefly.
Leandro Castan (Vasco da Gama) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half is underway. Vasco da Gama with the kick-off.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 46, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Internacional throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
German Cano of Vasco da Gama gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 48, Ball goes out of play for a Internacional goal kick.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the away team a throw-in.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 50, Throw-in for Internacional in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Yago Pikachu for Vasco da Gama gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 51, Braulio da Silva Machado awards Internacional a goal kick.
Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Can Vasco da Gama get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Internacional's half?
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Internacional.
In Porto Alegre Vasco da Gama attack through Carlinhos. The finish is off target, however.
Internacional have a goal kick.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in Internacional.
Internacional pushes forward through Thiago Galhardo, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 56, Free kick for Internacional in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama drives forward and German Cano gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Internacional's half.
In the minute 59, Martin Benitez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Vasco da Gama.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Edenilson.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Internacional’s Edenilson is on his feet again at Estadio Beira-Rio.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 63, Internacional awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Internacional territory.
Free kick for Internacional in the half of Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 66, Eduardo Coudet is making the team's first substitution at Estadio Beira-Rio with Yuri Alberto replacing Abel Hernandez.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 68, Internacional will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Vasco da Gama.
Victor Cuesta (Internacional) gets booked by Braulio da Silva Machado, and will miss the next match due to the number of yellow cards received this season.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 70, Miranda (Vasco da Gama) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Goal kick for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
In the minute 71, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Guilherme Parede is replacing Marcos Junior for Vasco da Gama at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Internacional's Yuri Alberto breaks free at Estadio Beira-Rio. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 73, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In Porto Alegre Internacional drive forward through Edenilson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Vasco da Gama needs to be cautious. Internacional have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 76, Braulio da Silva Machado awards Vasco da Gama a goal kick.
The home team have replaced Thiago Galhardo with Andres D'Alessandro. This is the second substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
Rodrigo Dourado is replacing Patrick for the home team.
In the minute 78, In Porto Alegre a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ricardo Sa Pinto (Vasco da Gama) is making a second substitution, with Vinicius replacing Martin Benitez.
In the minute 81, Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Vasco da Gama have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Internacional in their own half.
In the minute 82, Throw-in for Internacional at Estadio Beira-Rio.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 87, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
The home team replace Rodrigo Lindoso with Praxedes.
The home team have replaced Marcos Guilherme with Rodrigo Moledo. This is the fifth substitution made today by Eduardo Coudet.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Internacional have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Important block from the Vasco da Gama defence as Uendel fires in a strike for Internacional.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Internacional.
It's 2-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Ricardo Sa Pinto (Vasco da Gama) is making a third substitution, with Fellipe Bastos replacing Andrey.
